about_the_game:
Devoid is a roguelike horror game all about exploring the depths of the world and utilising your surroundings to survive the terrors within. Packed with horrifying ambience, relentless entities that try to hunt you down, and a boatload of perks to experiment and play around with. 

PERKS

Perks are the powerup system of this roguelike game. Throughout the maps, you will find a selection of perks which can boost your health, speed, and provide overall positive effects

LEVELS

Like any good roguelike should, Devoid's levels are randomly generated, providing a fresh experience each time you play. This also proves itself a challenge, as the terrain is never the same!

BOSSES

Throughout the game, you'll encounter a variety of bosses. Challenging but rewarding, you as the player have a choice as to which boss to fight each time. Can you beat them?

GAME LOOP

Dying in this game results in your reset at the very beginning of the game, only now you've grown stronger...

The deeper you go, the messier it gets. The depths of this pit are unforgiving and cold.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11 or later
  • Processor: Intel: 2.0 GHz dual-core Intel processor or higher. Apple Silicon: Apple M1 or M2 chip
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 (Mojave) or later
  • Processor: Intel: 2.5 GHz quad-core Intel Core i5 or better Apple Silicon: Apple M1 or M2 chip for optimal performance
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (e.g. AMD Radeon)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Sent down a pit by a mysterious voice named "Central", you explore the deep and cavernous remains of what seem to be man-made structures. Throughout your travels, youll find that you aren't alone as you traverse deeper and deeper in this horror roguelike.
